Container.Name: minisatip
Container.Overview: Minisatip(https://github.com/catalinii/minisatip) is a multi-threaded satip server version 1.2 that runs under Linux and it was tested with DVB-S, DVB-S2, DVB-T, DVB-T2, DVB-C, DVB-C2, ATSC and ISDB-T cards.
Container.Changes:
### 2024-06-30 - Rebase to Alpine 3.20.
### 2023-12-08 - Rebase to Alpine 3.19, switch to building from releases rather than commits.
### 2023-07-26 - Build with DDCI=1 for Digital Devices CI support.
### 2023-07-03 - Deprecate armhf. As announced here(https://www.linuxserver.io/blog/a-farewell-to-arm-hf)
### 2022-11-12 - Rebasing to alpine 3.137, upgrading to s6v3.
### 2021-01-23 - Rebasing to alpine 3.13.
### 2020-06-01 - Rebasing to alpine 3.12.
### 2019-12-19 - Rebasing to alpine 3.11.
### 2019-06-28 - Rebasing to alpine 3.10.
### 2019-03-23 - Switching to new Base images, shift to arm32v7 tag.
### 2019-02-22 - Rebasing to alpine 3.9.
### 2019-02-20 - Fix run options.
### 2019-02-11 - Add pipeline logic and multi arch.
### 2018-08-28 - Rebase to Alpine 3.8.
### 2017-12-13 - Rebase to Alpine 3.7.
### 2017-05-28 - Rebase to Alpine 3.6.
### 2017-02-08 - Rebase to Alpine 3.5 and only compile libs in dvb-apps.
### 2016-10-14 - Add version layer information.
### 2016-09-18 - Add support for Common Interface.
### 2016-09-11 - Add layer badges to README.
### 2016-08-28 - Add badges to README.
### 2016-08-15 - Initial Release.

Config.Name: RUN_OPTS
Config.Description: Specify specific run params for minisatip
